Participants.evidence: Of the 10 patients enrolled, nine had resectable esophageal adenocarcinoma

Intervention.evidence: underwent NIR mapping following peritumoral, submucosal injection of Indocyanine Green (ICG) alone or pre-mixed in human serum albumin (ICG:HSA)

Objective.evidence: Objective: To assess safety and feasibility of an intraoperative, minimally invasive NIR image-guided approach to lymphatic mapping in esophageal cancer patients.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Intraoperative NIR imaging demonstrated NIR signal at all tumors and in 2–6 NIR + regional LNs in six of the patients.
